root.name: Atari Masterpieces Vol. II
root.description: OverviewAtari Masterpieces Vol. 2 is a compilation of classic games developed and published by Atari SA for the N-Gage platform.Just like Atari Masterpieces Vol. 1, this game makes use of the N-Gage Arena service to post high scores online.Games IncludedLike Atari Masterpieces Vol. 1, Volume 2 also contains 8 classic games with 4 unlockable Atari 2600 games.Games Unlocked From the StartAsteroids DeluxeCentipedeCrystal CastlesLiberatorPongSpace DuelTempestWarlordsUnlockable GamesAir-Sea BattleCanyon BomberMini GolfVideo Checkers
